name: wallpaperio
description: Sets National Geographics photo of the day as wallpaper

scripts.package-mac: electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=assets/icons/mac/icon.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds && cp settings.json release-builds/wallpaperio-darwin-x64/ && cp icon.icns release-builds/wallpaperio-darwin-x64/icon.icns
scripts.package-win: electron-packager . Wallpaperio --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/icons/win/icon.ico --prune=true --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Wallpaperio" --out=release-builds && cp settings.json release-builds/Wallpaperio-win32-ia32/ && cp icon.ico release-builds/Wallpaperio-win32-ia32/icon.ico
scripts.package-linux: electron-packager . Wallpaperio --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=assets/icons/png/icon.png --prune=true --out=release-builds && cp settings.json release-builds/Wallpaperio-linux-x64/ && cp icon.png release-builds/Wallpaperio-linux-x64/icon.png
